channel.title: Ballerscape - Achievements, Minigames, Quests, Economy, 24/7
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://ballerscape.com/forum/images/style/logo.png[/img] [URL=http://"http://ballerscape.com/play.php"][IMG]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/35320740/UpdatesinPics/advert6.png[/img][/URL][URL=http://"http://ballerscape.com/forum"][IMG]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/35320740/UpdatesinPics/advert7.png[/img][/URL][COLOR=#FF8C00][SIZE=6]
[/SIZE][/COLOR][B][COLOR=#ffa500][SIZE=2][U][SIZE=4]What is ballerscape?[/SIZE][/U][/SIZE][/COLOR][/B][COLOR=#FF8C00] [SIZE=2]We are a private server community as the rest of everyone here ofcourse [/SIZE]but we believe that we strive for the players suggestions and opinions for a great gameplay. We've listened and done what they've told us and how they want it.
[/COLOR][U][B][COLOR=#ffa500][SIZE=4]Why we do what the players say?[/SIZE][/COLOR][/B] [/U][COLOR=#FF8C00]That is possibly the easiest thing to answer, it's the players that play and wants to have fun while playing also. That's why we do what they want as it's all for them.
[/COLOR][COLOR=#ffa500][B][SIZE=4]Features:[/SIZE][/B][/COLOR][COLOR=#FF8C00]
[/COLOR][COLOR=#ffa500][B]- Skills[/B][/COLOR][COLOR=#FF8C00] Melee skills works properly Runecrafting with all altars working (multiple runes etc) Hunter with impling catching and butterflys Agility with gnome and barbarian course Herblore with correct potion creation and herb cleaning Agility with npc pickpocketing and stalls Crafting with gems, tanning, hide creation Fletching with all bows/cbows etc working correctly Slayer with tasks according to slayer level Summoning with pouch and scroll creation (summon specials working) Mining with perfect timers and all ores mineable, prospectable Smithing with interface and creation, jewelry creation also works Fishing with fishes from shrimps to rocktails Cooking with fishes from shrimps to rocktails Firemaking which is clipped and with ashes Woodcutting with perfected timers Farming with raking, dibbing, watering and picking
[/COLOR][COLOR=#ffa500][B]- Player Killing[/B][/COLOR][COLOR=#FF8C00] Various known PKing areas put into simple teleports Kill Count, keep count on your total kills Death Count, keep count on your total deaths Current Streak, keep count on your current Killstreak Highest Streak, keep count on your highest total Killstreak
[/COLOR][COLOR=#ffa500][B]- Adventuring[/B][/COLOR][COLOR=#FF8C00] Achievement system to complete various tasks for points/rewards Quests/Mini-Quests to complete for points/rewards and perks - Prestigeing for prestige points and titles
[/COLOR][COLOR=#ffa500][B]- Minigaming[/B][/COLOR][COLOR=#FF8C00] Duel Arena, use to fight for fun or bet in a stake Fight Pits to compete about the winning spot Fight Caves to obtain firecape-kil'n cape - Pest control
[/COLOR][COLOR=#ffa500]- Bosses[/COLOR][COLOR=#FF8C00] Tormented demons Corporeal beast with lair Godwars dungeon working fully Full barrows Glacors Jadinkos Frost Dragons Strykewyrms
- Newer set of items, maps and npcs for those who also likes he higher revisions
[/COLOR][COLOR=#ffa500][B]- Misc[/B][/COLOR][COLOR=#FF8C00] Curse prayers Vote4Items Clanchat
- More in store, and much more to come!
[/COLOR][SPOIL][COLOR=#FF8C00]Media [/COLOR][IMG]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/35320740/UpdatesinPics/preview5.png[/img] [IMG]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/35320740/UpdatesinPics/advert.png[/img] [IMG]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/35320740/UpdatesinPics/advert4.png[/img] [IMG]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/35320740/UpdatesinPics/advert5.png[/img] [IMG]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/35320740/UpdatesinPics/achievement.png[/img] [IMG]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/35320740/UpdatesinPics/advert13.png[/img] [IMG]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/35320740/UpdatesinPics/advert14.png[/img] [COLOR=#FF8C00]Still more to come.. [/COLOR][/SPOIL][COLOR=#FF8C00]
[/COLOR][/CENTER]

item.title: Ballerscape - Achievements, Minigames, Quests, Economy, 24/7
item.dc:creator: @BSrsps BSrsps
item.description:
@BSrsps wrote:

[CENTER]
[URL=http://“http://ballerscape.com/play.php”][/URL][URL=http://“http://ballerscape.com/forum”][/URL][COLOR=#FF8C00][SIZE=6]

[/SIZE][/COLOR][B][COLOR=#ffa500][SIZE=2][U][SIZE=4]What is ballerscape?[/SIZE][/U][/SIZE][/COLOR][/B][COLOR=#FF8C00]
[SIZE=2]We are a private server community as the rest of everyone here ofcourse
[/SIZE]but we believe that we strive for the players suggestions and opinions for a great gameplay.
We’ve listened and done what they’ve told us and how they want it.

[/COLOR][U][B][COLOR=#ffa500][SIZE=4]Why we do what the players say?[/SIZE][/COLOR][/B]
[/U][COLOR=#FF8C00]That is possibly the easiest thing to answer, it’s the players that play and wants to have fun while playing also.
That’s why we do what they want as it’s all for them.

[/COLOR][COLOR=#ffa500][B][SIZE=4]Features:[/SIZE][/B][/COLOR][COLOR=#FF8C00]

[/COLOR][COLOR=#ffa500][B]- Skills[/B][/COLOR][COLOR=#FF8C00]
Melee skills works properly
Runecrafting with all altars working (multiple runes etc)
Hunter with impling catching and butterflys
Agility with gnome and barbarian course
Herblore with correct potion creation and herb cleaning
Agility with npc pickpocketing and stalls
Crafting with gems, tanning, hide creation
Fletching with all bows/cbows etc working correctly
Slayer with tasks according to slayer level
Summoning with pouch and scroll creation (summon specials working)
Mining with perfect timers and all ores mineable, prospectable
Smithing with interface and creation, jewelry creation also works
Fishing with fishes from shrimps to rocktails
Cooking with fishes from shrimps to rocktails
Firemaking which is clipped and with ashes
Woodcutting with perfected timers
Farming with raking, dibbing, watering and picking

[/COLOR][COLOR=#ffa500][B]- Player Killing[/B][/COLOR][COLOR=#FF8C00]
Various known PKing areas put into simple teleports
Kill Count, keep count on your total kills
Death Count, keep count on your total deaths
Current Streak, keep count on your current Killstreak
Highest Streak, keep count on your highest total Killstreak

[/COLOR][COLOR=#ffa500][B]- Adventuring[/B][/COLOR][COLOR=#FF8C00]
Achievement system to complete various tasks for points/rewards
Quests/Mini-Quests to complete for points/rewards and perks

  • Prestigeing for prestige points and titles

[/COLOR][COLOR=#ffa500][B]- Minigaming[/B][/COLOR][COLOR=#FF8C00]
Duel Arena, use to fight for fun or bet in a stake
Fight Pits to compete about the winning spot
Fight Caves to obtain firecape-kil’n cape

  • Pest control

[/COLOR][COLOR=#ffa500]- Bosses[/COLOR][COLOR=#FF8C00]
Tormented demons
Corporeal beast with lair
Godwars dungeon working fully
Full barrows
Glacors
Jadinkos
Frost Dragons
Strykewyrms

  • Newer set of items, maps and npcs for those who also likes he higher revisions

[/COLOR][COLOR=#ffa500][B]- Misc[/B][/COLOR][COLOR=#FF8C00]
Curse prayers
Vote4Items
Clanchat

  • More in store, and much more to come!

[/COLOR][SPOIL][COLOR=#FF8C00]Media
[/COLOR]






[COLOR=#FF8C00]Still more to come…
[/COLOR][/SPOIL][COLOR=#FF8C00]

[/COLOR][/CENTER]

Read full topic
